modName: Xbox 360 Controls for Sky Ui 3 dot 1
summary: Fixes those dam problems with new scheme working venders/comp/store/trade and RT+LT
descriptionHtml:
Install:
If you changed the settings keys make a copy of file \\\"ControlMap_Custom.txt\\\". Extract the contents of the archive to your Skyrim/Data/ folder.

Uninstall 
Remove files \\\"ControlMap_Custom.txt\\\" and \\\"Data\\\\Interface\\\\controls\\\\pc\\\\controlmap.txt\\\".

Configuration controller:
A        = activate
X        = ready weapon
Y        = shout
B        = jump
Back     = tween menu
Start    = journal
LS       = move
RS       = look
LS click = sneak
RS click = toggle POV
LT       = left hand
RT       = right hand
LB       = sprint
RB       = empty

LB+X       = magic
LB+Y       = stats
LB+B       = inventory
LB+A       = map
A+B        = wait
A+Back     = quick save
A+Start    = quick load
A+LS click = auto-move
RB+A       = zoom in (3rd person view)
RB+B       = zoom out (3rd person view)

up(digital)       = favorites
down(digital)     = favorites
left(digital)     = Hotkey 1
right(digital)    = Hotkey 2
LB+left(digital)  = Hotkey 3
LB+right(digital) = Hotkey 4
RB+left(digital)  = Hotkey 5
RB+right(digital) = Hotkey 6
LB+Back           = Hotkey 7
RB+Start          = Hotkey 8

up&down(digital) = scrolling favorites
up&down LS       = scrolling favorites
author: IDzeroNo
